name: Suspicious Fruity Smoothie
desc: A beverage of simple and clean colors. The freezing-cold smoothie seems to send you directly to the peak of Dragonspine. It's so cold up there, you can feel yourself accumulating Sheer Cold... You'd better find a bonfire quickly to stave off the damage before you hit the limit!

customize.name: Recipe: Fruity Smoothie
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fruity Smoothie.

customize.name: Berry
customize.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Qingxin
customize.desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Fruity Smoothie
customize.desc: A beverage with simple colors. The smoothie made out of fruit-flavored yogurt has been arranged to resemble the blue sky and white clouds. At the bottom is a thick layer of jelly and finely-cut fruit. The revitalizing flavor makes this beverage the best choice in the summer.

customize.name: Delicious Fruity Smoothie
customize.desc: A beverage of simple and clean colors. The refreshing smoothie with a faint fruity scent reminds you of the ethereal clouds above Qingyun Peak. Does it taste as light and fluffy?

value.text: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.
